PickTicketProduct.name: PickTicketProduct
PickTicketProduct.description: Represents a quantity of a product to be picked as part of a PickTicket. It can include quantities for multiple FulfillmentOrders.

PickTicketId.description: ID of the PickTicket associated with the PickTicketProduct.

PickedQuantity.description: Quantity of the PickTicketProduct that has been picked.

Product2Id.description: ID of the product associated with the PickTicketProduct.

ProductCode.description: Product code of the product associated with the PickTicketProduct.

Quantity.description: Total quantity that’s requested to be picked of the associated product.

RejectReason.description: The reason why some or all of the requested quantity isn’t being picked.

RejectedQuantity.description: The requested quantity that hasn’t been picked. When the status category of the associated PickTicket is set to Completed, this value is automatically calculated as Quantity - PickedQuantity.

StockKeepingUnit.description: The stock keeping unit (SKU) of the associated product.

PickTicketProduct.accessRules: This object is available with an Order Management Growth license.
